author: Special Correspondent
text: A month-long training in yogasana, pranayama, meditation and balanced diet will be conducted at the Gandhi Museum here from March 2 in three batches at 6 a.m., 10.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m. The 10.30 a.m. session will be for women. For details, contact 9487537339.
title: Month-long yoga training
